summary: WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS AT IDLE IT SHOOK.  THE DEALERSHIP CLEANED THE THROTTLE, BUT THE PROBLEM STILL EXISTED.   *NLM  AFTER MANY TIMES OF GOING TO THE DEALER FOR REPAIRS, THE TIMING VALVES WERE FOUND TO BE A PROBLEM IN WHICH THEY  WERE FRACTURED.  ALSO, THE ELECTRICAL BULBS IN THE FRONT AND TAIL HAD FAILED.  SCC
